Legal_Issue: Breach of procedural fairness due to failure to consider submissions
Outcome: Decision set aside, case remitted for reconsideration
Procedural_Context: Judicial review of refugee claim decision
Evidence_Type: Submissions dated November 25, 2002; evidence on country conditions in Pakistan
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to consider final submissions addressing new evidence
Evidence_Ignored: November 25, 2002 submissions responding to new evidence
Application_Factor: Submissions addressed substantial new material despite some repetition
Decision_Outcome: Refugee claim dismissed initially, decision set aside on review
Outcome_of_Review: Remitted for reconsideration by a different panel
Cause_of_Refusal: Perceived improved state protection in Pakistan
Evidentiary_Issues: New evidence on country conditions not properly addressed
Procedural_Fairness: Breached due to failure to consider submissions
